description: Oil, found only through an oil detector (or raw unfettered luck) is obtainable solely through the use of a pumpjack. Pumpjacks require bearings to draw the oil, in a found oil chunk, from the deepest bedrock and begin drawing it upwards with a rotor. Once set up the pumpjack will have a hoisting mount with a cord to the pumpjack fuel port on one end and a rotating input on the other.
Reference this video for a more proper tutorial;
